name: Destructorb
description:
If you look at other games I have created, destruction seems to be a common theme. Naturally I continued with that in my game for the One Button Jam: Destructorb. As the jam name implies, only one button is used (even for the menus): the space bar.

The goal here is to launch the ball and destroy as many objects as you can until it comes to a stop. With any luck, you will hit a fuel truck to give it another push. High scores are saved for each level (of which there are three), so see if you can set a new record (extra special props if you manage to get a score above 1,000)!
